code: import axios from"axios";import{languages_ver}from"./data";import{getGlobalString}from"./Input";const API=axios.create({baseURL:"https://emkc.org/api/v2/piston"});const executeCode=async(language,code)=>{const i=getGlobalString();const response=await API.post("/execute",{language:language,version:languages_ver[language],files:[{content:code}],stdin:i});return response.data;};export default executeCode;
